title.narrative: In-Country Counternarcotics Program: Small-scale Construction

description.narrative: Refurbish training faciity (classrooms) in Republic of North Macedonia to support Balkan Regional Counter Trafficking Center. under U.S. European Command. The U.S. Department of Defense International Counter-Drug Program (ICDP) enables the Secretary of Defense to provide foreign governments with support, such as training and equipment, to combat illicit drug trafficking and transnational organized crime.

title.narrative: U.S. Department of Defense, Institutional Capacity Building Programs: Wales Initiative Fund activities, events, and exercises

description.narrative: North Macedonia - Human Resource Management #3. Assess the progress in reforms across the Ministry of Defense (MoD) and Army of the Republic of North Macedonia (ARNM). Support the MoD and ARNM in the implementation phase of SDR reforms while they also attempt to integrate major programs with their new LTDDP 2019-2028. Review the transition to a new force structure which can meet NATO requirements and also the needs of North Macedonia, and support key activities to better prepare North Macedonia for NATO accession.
